segments.text: Daddy , are you going to the park with us this weekend ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Honey , I have a lot of work to do .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So you can't go with us , right ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Daddy , you always arrange your schedule so tight on weekdays . You should have a rest on weekends .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What park do you want to go to ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Daniel wants to go to the aquarium . While Mom wants to visit the Summer Palace .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Haven't we been these places already ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah . I don't agree with them , but I don't have a better choice .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Right , ah . It is so close to our home . How come we've never thought of that ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The Olympic Park has a small forest . It is fit for picnic .
segments.speaker: S2
